#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
unsigned long long int calc(long long int);
int main()
{
unsigned long long int j,k,t,n;
unsigned long long int i=0;
scanf("%llu",&t);
while(t--)
{
	scanf("%llu",&n);
	i=(calc(n));
	printf("%llu\n",i);
	i=0;
}

return 0;
}

unsigned long long int calc(long long int n)
{
if(n==0)return 0;
unsigned long long int i=0;
unsigned long long int s=1,num=1;
for(i=1;i<n;i++)
{
	num+=2;
	s*=num;
	if(s>(1000000007))s%=1000000007;
}
return s;
}
